verbose_text: Current-clamp and extracellular recordings were performed in NBQX (5 muM), R-CPP (2.5 muM), and picrotoxin (20 muM) to block AMPA receptors, NMDA receptors, and GABA A receptors respectively.
evidence: Current-clamp and extracellular recordings were performed in NBQX (5 muM), R-CPP (2.5 muM), and picrotoxin (20 muM) to block AMPA receptors
